lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors battle traffic from E3 to get here in time to roll dice and play Dungeons and Dragons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We also have the Dystopia DX, which is their big collector's box--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, is that what this one was from?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you guys have a chance to check it out, go see if it's something you'd be interested in, and make sure you put in the criticalrole-- all one word-- code to go ahead and get your subscription discount, which is fantastic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's like a-- yeah! We have a--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We’re giving out crates in a chat room thing, don't we?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's going to be one at the break? It's going to be a giveaway at the break?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm just going to start making stuff up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that-- did you just point and--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You must be active! Stay tuned for that! Exclamation point!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm so glad someone wrote that down for us!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'm so glad they wrote out the exclamation point.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm in the chat right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so the next couple of things we want to mention to you guys real fast: We have, it started up today, a Critical Role t-shirt contest that went up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When all those designs have been submitted, we ourselves, the cast of Critical Role, are going to pore through and pick our favorite.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (funny accent) And we will have designs incoming forward for official Critical Role shirt stuffs, which is nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (similar accent) Critter, it's a Critter shirt.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are they all going to be like Boaty McBoatface or something? (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Boaty McBoatface is like an online "name our boat." (all say Boaty McBoatface)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, who did we send to Alaska? Who was that? Was that Flo Rida?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mess up his name intentionally all the time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He played in, like, a Wal-Mart in Anchorage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But it was like a joke for publicity, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He went ahead and did it! The online poll for his next performance, the internet trolled him and made it to this far Alaska performance.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A Wal-Mart in Anchorage, or something like that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he did it! I was like, "respect to you, man. Well done."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we talk about our next thing because I'm so excited about it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we get to show it, or no?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, okay, so Liam gets to say it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We talked about it a bunch on this show--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's only gotten better with time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But I bring that up because while Joe is a busy, busy guy, he somehow found the time-- I'm so excited-- to create an exclusive art piece for Critical Role.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's blocking my face, but I want to see it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Guys, if you go over to the Geek and Sundry shop right now, this is on pre-order, so-- I'm going over my script-- signed versions of this will be available for pre-order for 2 weeks only.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So this is now or never.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Now or never and then it goes away forever.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I wonder if we should show a close-up or something.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vex is on the paper, so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, don't take it away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's an image on the website, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And there's a place to click on the page where you are right now watching this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you scroll down, there'll be a button.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scroll down to the bottom of the page, there's a button for that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is getting framed and becoming a centerpiece of our home.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Signed, by the way, signed by us, not by the artist.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hunt him down if you wanted to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (in a funny accent) Taliesin, you are going to be somewhere this weekend, are you not?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will be at Amazing Comic Con in Vegas all weekend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And if I recall, there was also a recent announcement of a cool Telltale game that went up this week.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, man! Batman the Telltale series!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They announced the Batman cast and Laura is playing Catwoman Selina Kyle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And at E3 today, we went and checked out the demo and it's pretty frickin' cool.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I saw it yesterday and today because I just couldn't not watch it again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, anyone else have anything they want to talk about? (southern drawl) Or shall we dive into the rest of tonight's story?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Part of this process was meeting an individual named Kerrek, who was a blacksmith who had been in the town for a while, who unwittingly became part of this discussion--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys had a hot springs episode in the mansion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you guys want to do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The general omniscient glow through the clouds, kind of diffused light, but based on the time that you-- where you were and how far you traveled, you gather it's probably early to mid-afternoon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where would you like to go?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I need to go to the temple of the Raven Queen.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't need everyone to come.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have a lot of errands to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My only errand is to keep my eyes on you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have some errands to run.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you need any help with your errands?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would love some help with my errands.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know what that means, but I'm sure I take great offense.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That eagle form really made a difference.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where is this Raven Queen's temple?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we surrounded by people? Are there people walking about?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are more being installed upon the inner walls, and the ones in the distance appear to be under some form of construction.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why don't we go claim our rooms and I'm sure they can lead us to everywhere we need to go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Want to go check in at the Slayer's Take?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And we can meet back there when everything is done.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you need to check in at your temple, or should we pretend you're not here so they don't try to make you stay?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let's just pretend for a little bit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: At least, that I know of right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: God will wait for a long time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anything you specifically require in this place?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I grab one of the people that are here and ask him, What's all the hustle about outside? I see them installing more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But as you come over to ask him the question, he looks up to you and goes, "Word's gone around the town recently "that there's some wandering dragon horde "tearing through Tal'Dorei, "so they're just upping security around these places, just in case."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hope they make their way here."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nobody's sighted the dragons, though, over here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not to my knowledge, but "(chuckles) I'd love to get my hand on some of them scales." (blade scrapes)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It took over 50 episodes for that to happen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sorry, what was the question?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, when you don't take notes when I give you a character's name originally, and they come back around and it's weird when you suddenly take damage and your character starts hemorrhaging.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm just sitting by the fire, so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we have seen this guy before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's many members that you've come across in the past.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How are the people doing? Is there a sense of worry, or do you guys feel pretty secure?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's the reason it's been around for a long time, "and I'd like to see them try."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have you ever encountered a dragon personally, Loran?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean, I've come across a few small ilk in my days."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keyleth is proud of herself because we've just killed our third, actually.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Liam, I don't want to ask Matt this, but the chick that runs the Slayer's Take, her name's Vanessa?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks toward the back room, where her main office is, and he goes, "You're welcome to go ahead and knock on the door "if you're feeling frisky."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we try to sell Vanessa some of our dragon bits?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should sell to a merchant?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, they tend to be in the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Love that you asked me that question.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, right? What was I thinking?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Keep a few of the scales, obviously.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We can tell what my place in the party is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course. Grog, come with me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll talk about the cold bag for now and see if there's anything else they want to talk about.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have an idea for teeth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (sing-song) Vanessa? Vox Machina here-- oh, hi.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "May I... be of service to you?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I really thought you'd be better at this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you might have heard about him. Umbrasyl... (chuckles)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I do have one up for a bronze or perhaps a white, but..."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, white! Do we have any white bits left?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We should have white from back in the day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What, do you want scales or...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was the dragon we killed for you before, because we didn't bring the--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, it was before that one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is for a newer one I came by."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've killed four dragons?! Four fucking dragons. Go us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Excuse us while we reminisce, apparently.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hold onto that, because that would save you a trip."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We do have some white scales left over, don't we?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The hide would fetch more, but-- 60 pounds, you said?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 5,000 gold pieces, I think is a fair price.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if we gave you less dragon scales? Would you have said less money?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we'll keep them and we'll sell them to other vendors, then.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Haven't we had them for years?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have a thing I'm thinking about.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If they've been a problem for you, then I'm sure this would be easy."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where are we going to sell these? The world's on fire!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There aren't that many white dragons walking around--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If we're ever in a pinch for money, we can come back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Besides, I've been working on that dragon immunity potion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is all right. Goodbye." And she shoos you out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where's the temple of the Raven Queen?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I have work to get done."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That does nothing for me." (slamming) Slams the door shut.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They are worth so much more.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To whom? We haven't ever sold them or come across anyone who wanted them before.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is no reason to get rid of something for wholesale.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That doesn't mean we should just give them away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We also are almost full in our Bag of Holding, might I remind you, and 64 pounds would free up quite some--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But I could get rid of some other stuff.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We also have 15 cases of expensive-ass bottles of wine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I feel-- and I apologize if it seems like I say this a lot, but I do have a castle that we can drop things at, and we can leave them there, perhaps get back to them at a later date.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To be fair, Percy, you do a lot to remind us to try not to forget that you're titled.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To be fair, have we ever gone back for something before, ever, in our entire travels?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We could go to Whitestone next.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, drop everything off, create a little nest of what we need.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You found the troll dick, didn't you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you have in there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I bet those have gone really bad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I reach into the Bag of Holding and think about one basilisk egg.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm sure they smell like Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You pull out a basilisk egg.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do they just turn to stone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It has a somewhat, very vague sulfurous scent on the outside of the egg.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll put it back in the bag.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could make stink-bombs with it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You go see the Raven Queen and we wait outside.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it in the direction where I have to go?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll come with you, as well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, three! Who else? Any other takers while Vax goes and gets a tattoo?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I thought that-- is that not what you're doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is. I'm getting a tattoo.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Across the small of my back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you still have that raven's skull I gave you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do. We'll talk about that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But I've found in moments when I was feeling less than brave that pretending to be somebody else on occasion, even afterwards, can be helpful.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there anything left inside of this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm feeling... what would be the word? Superstitious.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I was going to say "giving."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know, I kind of like it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You four are going to the Duskmeadow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You, I assume, make your way to a very familiar abode. (laughs)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Of all the options of the world that you've given me...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is really your fault as much as it's mine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The door is partially open as you approach.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You might be blown up if you go in there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (louder) Hello? Victor, are you home? It's Percy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Want me to go in and investigate?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where is the owner of this domicile?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How long has he been gone for?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you have any idea where he's been off to?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I'm going to pop in and check really quickly, just letting you know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The same familiar smell of fresh earth, really, really, really dry dust and a very familiar smell of explosive black powder material.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I don't see anybody in here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, should we just purchase what you need via the honor system and leave some coin behind?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Also, I need to talk to him about some personal issues.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (thud) You see off to the side, what you didn't initially notice as you entered, what appears to be a wooden trapdoor in the far corner that (thud).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (repeated thuds) And you notice that apparently something-- a large sack of some heavy material has rolled off a nearby table and is now currently holding the door down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You lift it up, set it off to the side. (boosh) "(coughing) What's going on? You trying to kill me?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You were stuck-- you had gotten stuck down-- what is down there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you not understand simple English?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It makes it hard to get out!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, I've been locked down here for hours!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Grog, Scanlan? (stutters) Come on in, he's fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have to build him a hand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog, can you get him out, can you lift him up?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Grog, can you lift the poor--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I grab the stump and I pick him up into the air.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I shake him a little bit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Treat him slightly better than you would treat a member of your own family.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, don't shake him too hard-- I'm not there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I put him gently back on the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you." He pats you on the head with his nub.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes over and then pulls the ladder up that he didn't use, closes the--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I was hoping to buy a little bit more black powder from you, if possible, and I'm curious if you had anything else for sale, and I wanted to ask you a couple of questions, just about other customers again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Has a one-armed lady, a one-handed lady, a doctor come by to purchase--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I would never insult your honor or preferences of any kind.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Victor, I think you know how I feel about that, but you're a very attractive man, and--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Some sort of simple clawing mechanism for grasping, lifting, not getting caught in your mine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Maybe a trade? Maybe a claw?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Build and bring, and we trade."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would ask one other thing, if I am to do this for you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, so many questions! "Does he have questions, too? Does he have questions, too?!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I do have a question, actually.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't have any questions. None.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there a hat shop around here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, thank you. Thank you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was everything I could have hoped for, and more.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Has Dr. Ripley-- has a woman come by to buy black powder, one hand, one mechanical hand, one normal hand? Mechanical hand?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Is that the one you're saying you can make?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to make you something, nice and useful claw piece, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So you're saying that this woman "made a better hand than you can make?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I can make a better hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then make me a better hand! Why would you give me a lesser hand?!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (ripping sounds) He starts unwrapping the wound.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will need another hogshead and a half of black powder and a little information about another customer and then I will leave you to your work. Is that fair?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fair!" He turns around, rushes over, and grabs the same phantom hogshead that he has lying around his place.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He eats a lot of pork.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Before he fills it with powder, he goes over to Scanlan and goes, "(hums) Too big."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll be back in just a little bit with-- actually, do you have a glove that you used to wear, or anything like that? Do you have something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes!" He pulls out the glove that was on the hand, (laughing) and you can see that it's blown apart, hand burned to cinders--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can take measurements from that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's more a sleeve with a charcoaled edge.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, but Keyleth can, and I think that would save you a lot of time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, but we can go get her and come back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think she can just fix his hand.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not today, but I can over time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Want me to give it a try?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just going to have to see to it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think he would prefer a real hand than a claw hand.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Would you prefer a real hand or a claw hand?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How cool is the claw hand?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I would much rather you spend time on projects for us than projects for him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And believe me, I would like--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can make this myself, it's just very difficult.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have party members who can regrow his hand.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He wants the claw to be cooler than that lady's claw hand.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's give him a reasonable claw, yeah?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And if you can't do the mansion, I know where I can go get some work done.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They have a workshop, don't they?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will not leave town before I've delivered to you something--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll be back! It'll be good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we going to go find a hat shop, then?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We will be back. Stay safe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to go find a workshop to work on something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to go see if the Slayer's Take has--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I cannot handle any more of that. That was brutal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I feel like you’re just on a higher level.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just thought you were going to make him not there so you didn't have to do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's just not home. Sorry, guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So, I'm going to go see if there's-- if there's not a blacksmithing, if there's not somewhere I can do a bit of basic smithing work and technical work, then I'm going to go find that blacksmith from last time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want something that's going to be a little more to the level of what you're doing, you may have to actually rent out a facility.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I'm going to go find that young chap from before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to rent the forge for the day to craft whatever it is you're looking to craft, he's charging you 50 gold for the day.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 50 gold for the day? Can I use all of his tools and just my own materials?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to supply your own material, but he'll let you rent.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to run and find Vax, get my stuff, and go to work.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You four make your way over towards the Duskmeadow.

lines.text: As you step out of the room, you hear a whisper come from beyond the chamber, within the darkness. It says, "Is it yourself you wish to fix or something more?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There is something broken in the world.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where do you wish me to go?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Put my clothes in the corner.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I go into the pool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you step into the chamber, freezing cold as your toes--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear the whisper in your ears just as your head reaches the level of the blood, that says, "Come. Come to me with your questions." Just as your head goes beneath the surface.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're underneath and in darkness, feeling around the thick material, kind of just swishing your fingers around, but amongst the liquid, you still hear the whisper again in your ear: "Come. Bring your questions."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I swim down until it's uncomfortable.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You reach a somewhat concave, smooth floor to the pool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sighs) I do not do well with this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you look around over your shoulder and then right behind you, you see immediately a white porcelain face, the head is just standing there amongst the shadow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (takes deep breaths) Do you know what I've done?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: First is, can we stop it? Can we stop what's been released? Is there something I can do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did it choose me because I was broken, or did it break me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And you were preyed upon, just as it preys upon others, "and will continue to do so until finally destroyed."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Just know: should you not watch yourself, "you may not find yourself on our side."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There is nowhere I can look for healing? Other than deeds? I like to fix things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A little bit of moonlight peeks through, and you can see the beams refracting through the purples and reds and blues and just hints of specks of light that just shimmer across the surface of this dark, glass-like floor.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: and I'm going to cast Hex on myself for my walk home and banish it before I come in the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as Percival finally wanders in, is there anything else anyone wants to achieve before the evening's done?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we next morning, or we're still evening, at this point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're still evening at the moment, if there's anything else you wish to achieve. Otherwise--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've been slowly heating water and giving it to Vax to put in his bath.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do manage to draw a comfortable bath for your brother and wash him clean.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't wash him! I just give him the fucking water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You aid him in washing himself clean. So you specify.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we see Percy when he comes in?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to walk quiet and late and go tinker on a little thing for a minute until I pass out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks a little frazzled, but doesn't seem to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I see any of the blood? Passive perception?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're in the tubby town, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I want you to make a dexterity check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like, that would've been a natural 20, would have been the only way around that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you all wish to rest for the evening?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I would like to take 12 hours to read my book.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so the first 12 hours are completed, but you do not sleep?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't be stingy, share those with me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I also spend a lot of time that night reading, but I'm reading the book about the Raven Queen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pretty much have it memorized at this point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys all find yourself to rest, except for Scanlan, who takes a point of exhaustion for going through the night without sleep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know what that is, but someone will tell me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll be back here in a minute, guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And get your Joe Mad poster!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, there's a giveaway at the break, I think.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, there's a Loot Crate giveaway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the DX boxes, so be active in the chat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And please go check out the Joe Mad poster.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you guys wish to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do we need to accomplish here in town? Is there anything we need to finish, or do we want to pick our next destination?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We did talk about the Feywild.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't tease me about the Feywild.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, don't you have to pick up something?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I already picked it up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I thought we waited for the hat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, he picked up the hat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's Marquet, which something is there in Marquet?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is one of the Vestiges there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know, everyone just keeps talking about it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, weren't we going to go to--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One of the Vestiges is in Marquet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on. Cabal's Ruin, which is a magic-devouring cloak--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we alone in this room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other appears to be going about their business.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a cloak that devours magic?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A merchant warrior with a missing eye.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And there's one in the bottom of the sea somewhere.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And there's a really beautiful strong bow in the Feywild.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, let's go to the Feywild! We at least know that place.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I say we drop everything-- we take a pit stop in Whitestone and head towards the Feywild.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you guys remember how I kind of did that thing with Grog's evil sword and kind of banished it away for forever?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can do that with the rest of us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can banish us to the Dread Emperor's island?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can Plane Shift us wherever we want to go, to an alternate plane.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To the Feywild? So we don't even have to find an entrance?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we just hold hands and think about it really hard.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And you put us in a safe spot somewhere in there, somehow?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can take us to where we've been before, to where it's familiar.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Have we been there before? I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it somewhere that you have to have been, or can it be somewhere that we have been.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It is somewhere I am familiar with, I believe, through means that I am familiar...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They transferred the entire city there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know, but you're saying we've been there, but they just did that recently.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Such as "City of Brass on the Elemental Plane of Fire."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, is that where we're going?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you guys want to go to the Plane of Fire, that's like, a hike and a jump through a hole.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I can get us there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How big is the Feywild? Is it like a football field?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, how do-- do we know where we're going in the Feywild?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I imagine we'll figure it out once we get there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I know anything about the Feywild?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no knowledge of the Feywild.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would we have learned something about it in Syngorn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have a general idea of it, somewhat--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a very strange place where some believe elves initially come from or craft from there, at least.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do the two of us know enough that were you to jump from the same place here, would you necessarily end up in the same spot in the Feywild?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do know it's a place of fey magic, it's tricky, it's difficult to follow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there something I can do, maybe try and...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hold on, is our stream up? Are we offline right now?

lines.name: LUCAS
lines.text: (muffled, from offscreen) I'm checking. Just wait.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Loot Crate. Check out Loot Crate.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Quit the program and go back in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The chat is saying it's off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tell them to quit and re-login.

lines.name: LUCAS
lines.text: I'm not sure it even dropped frames on my end.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whoa, we were in the Feywild for a second there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay! And we got the warden thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Guys, I'm so glad we won DND. We beat it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go to Whitestone and drop some stuff off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know, because the more I think about it, I mean, we almost just died many times and the last time we tried to get a Vestige it almost killed us, and maybe we just need a little bit more preparation, maybe?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There are certainly stories in the woods of Whitestone of strange happenings, so I'm sure there's probably some connection to the Feywild, and we'll see what happens.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Make sure Whitestone is actually preparing something underground just like Westruun.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, they have something underground already.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Exactly, but there's a spinning orb of death there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which, to be fair, is probably going to keep a dragon away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But I also think we've earned more than a single day of rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Ozmit Sea is to the east of you, east-southeast, and that is a wide gulf that separates-- from your perspective, looking at me, there's Othanzia, Ozmit Sea, and there's Tal'Dorei right here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Water Ashari live in the Ozmit Sea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I think they've got an island.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's also the sea that I sailed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How familiar are you with the sea?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, could I see the list of Vestiges?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The one in the bottom of the sea is called Whisper, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A blade forged from metal pulled from the Far Realm, it was the center of many dark rituals.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It now lies at the bottom of the Ozmit Sea, sunken with the lost ship, The Shrew.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Anyone know about the island of glass?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you heard about an island of glass?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have I heard about an island of glass? Have Pike or I heard of an island of glass?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll have both of you guys make history checks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You barely know what glass is right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Guys, water isn't glass, that's stupid.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would have a theory as to what it was.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You rolled a 20? Oh, go Pike!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Should I roll to figure out that this is probably an active volcano?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The idea of a volcano possibly comes to mind, but--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have not been there, you haven't seen it, but some of your crewmates while you were traveling aboard your ship for that five, six-month period, a couple of them did mention something about on the sea, a mirage-like island that glistens in the distance, but they said to avoid it, said it was dangerous.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did they say where it was?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Heard many tales of The Shrew.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, the ship lost at sea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know of The Shrew, you definitely know of The Shrew.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All sailors know of The Shrew.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's the story of The Shrew?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: There was a storm three hundred years ago.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And The Shrew just didn't sail on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) I was waiting for it to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Come around again? Yeah, it was good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Taming of the Shrew fits, yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Good tale, but we'll get there one day.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We will put that in our back pocket and we will think about it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That helmet is really something else.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You could really do something terrible to him with that thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm just saying, I think we have an edge now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But let's make sure that Whitestone is safe before we do such a thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Percy, we are in a place that has an airship dock.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could go steal an airship.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We could go steal an airship!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have an instant ability to transport anywhere.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It would be so cool, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We could hold all of our things on the airship, and I could have cannonades...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That will be the first thing we do when Thordak dies is we jump on an airship.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We won't need the airship if the dragons are dead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All the fun has gone out of it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Before we leave, do you want to sell these stupid white dragon scales?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (repeats piercing spell noise) Through a tree!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you all step through the portal, Percy and Scanlan look over their shoulder at the distant skyport and see the one airship docked there and think, "One day..."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you step out of the portal, you find yourself jumping out of the center of the Sun Tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you want to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While I'm in the tree, can I do something?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Go, go, go, go." And I kind of start teleporting through the tree and while I'm in the Sun Tree I just want to be like, "Hey, boo."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Have you heard of this whole cancerous tree situation "in the Feywild?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you finish this thought, you hear this sound emerge (vacuum sealing sound) and realize it's the sound of the whole portal you've made closing behind you because it only lasts for six seconds and you should probably get the hell out of the tree.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aww. I step out of the tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you emerge from the tree, a few individuals nearby stop and look and smile and wave, recognizing you as you approach.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are there any leaves on the Sun Tree yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are no leaves on the Sun Tree.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should check with the border patrol.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whistles) I whistle as loud as I can.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just want to go find Zahra and give her a hug and say hello and see how she's doing while he's talking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You whistle as loud as you can for a little bit. Nothing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Must be off doing something (belches) important.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm so glad to see you're all right."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I didn't kill him, actually, with it, but I did a lot of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There's a lot of really, really interesting things "that can be done with the materials in these mountains."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I sit down next to her and ask, just catching up, and see if they've spotted any dragons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's in the process of being set up right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Zahra, how long did it take you to make that arrow?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If I were to give you some more money, do you think you could do it again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Probably, based on what-- (sighs) if I'm able to use "some of the resources here within the castle, maybe."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll talk to Percy, but I'm sure, if it's for a good cause...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Wondrous." What else are you guys trying to achieve here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am trying to find Shaun Gilmore.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shaun? How did you know that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He told you guys that a long time ago.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tattooed at the small of his back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, he's got a tramp stamp.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I accompany Vax on this trip?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's start asking around town for him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I heard that you were off to do some dangerous things."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They're inspecting the ziggurat underneath the city, "so you could head down there if you wanted to find him."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not terribly familiar with Whitestone, could you point us in the right direction?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you again for all that you do." He clicks his heels together and continues walking through the city.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I guess we'll head down to the ziggurat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, are we all going down to the ziggurat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "My god, I've been waiting for you."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And all of you so graciously clean!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But in two or three weeks, it's not bad. You're looking well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She's been quite attentive to my needs."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "However, before anything else goes underway, I believe there's "a very important bit of business that we must attend to."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he walks straight up to Grog and just gives you a big hug.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And pats you on the shoulder and is like, "(chuckling) You big lug."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Walks over to you, Pike, and kneels down and gives you a little pinch on the cheek and is like, "Looking as spry and smiley as ever, I see."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I give him a kiss on the cheek.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I hear, if my words say correct, "that you folks are a recent dragon-slaying bunch, hmm?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And goes to Scanlan and goes to ruffle your hair, and goes, "And you, you, my little bardish friend."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Embrace it! It's what makes you different."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've been spreading the good word about you and your works.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I only hope one day to wear clothes as fine as you."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you for taking me into your home."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You do nothing but brighten these halls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I can see it in your eyes." He gives you a big hug.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I give him a hug back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've missed you most of all." And pulls you in for a big hug and lifts you up off the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're strong enough to-- be careful of your wound, Gilmore!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pat him on the ribs.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're very happy to see you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Dinner should be happening soon "and you should join us, now that you've returned, please."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, before dinner, I think we were all just curious on the state of the... ziggurat, as we were calling it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Spinning orb of death, is what we call it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, you said you were doing tests on it, right? Did you throw things at it? Did it blow up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing blew up. Things did go away."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think this would only behoove the conversation "if we're all present."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have some delicious and very expensive wine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Expensive-ass wine we could bust out with dinner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, come to the surface, then! This place is dreary."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all eventually make your way back to the surface, to Whitestone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go to Vex and Pike and go, "Is this a good opportunity for us to break out our formal wear?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I genuinely have no idea what you're talking about.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: On what plane are you right now? (laughs)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "It's the best smile I've had in ages."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: None of us have addressed it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did you tell him? Did you tell him yes, did you tell him no?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on, what exactly did he say, by the way?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I just said we'll circle back.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He just understands that I just--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Treat proposals like we do our dungeons? (laughs) We circle back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do you feel about him, Pike?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He wears you down a little.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And there's something there, for him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know if that's a good reason to say yes, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I noticed, he's becoming more charming.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, what is with that? I didn't know that was possible.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How? I feel like he goes to sleep and then the next morning he's like--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like, every once in a while I look at him and I go:

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, no, and then I feel really--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but he's small, but at the same time, I'm kind of interested.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right! And you kind of think about it for a second and you entertain it, and then you feel really gross about yourself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But if you're actually interested, then it's not gross at all.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No! Of course it's not gross if you're actually interested.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't want to push you, Pike, but you know, it's just us girls here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know! And we've been through so many uncomfortable things together.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's still something that I need to think about.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You pray to your Sarenrae about it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. (laughs) You do look lovely, though, in your dress.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do a little air cantrip to make the skirt poof out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, do you guys mind tying me up a bit?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (strained) No, but that means it's right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I assume there's clean clothes for everybody in their quarters?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I paid money for this thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I'm going to arrange for our stuff to be stowed in the vault.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gilmore is there, Eskil is there, Cassandra is there...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fine outfits have been provided for the men, if they wish to wear them, as well. Some do not.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sit down, have a beer, watch our game.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Within the next 15 minutes or so, before food is brought to the table, Allura finally enters in a very, very nice dress, and says, "It is so good to see you all are safe."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She then gives you a big, wonderful hug.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How's Kima? We haven't seen her yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Her hair is also in similar braids to her side and she herself is wearing a golden dress, though she's kind of like...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth goes over and gives her a hug.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This feels weird. Does this feel weird? This feels weird."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't have to wear a dress, Kima.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She darts off for a bit and Allura smiles and facepalms a bit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You ought to let her try that helmet on later.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A lot of energy was being placed in this location, "as there is an actual, what appears to be "an arcane leyline, a nexus point, "near and above Whitestone, hence the Sun Tree's placement."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So it's fair to assume that at the other end of this is something old, something trapped, something hungry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would it be in this plane or another?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "None of our rituals or enchantments "will let us see through this spinning marble, as you call it."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You haven't put any blood through it, though?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I'm hoping that hasn't happened.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or is it? Don't know? Is it that you have no idea what happened to things put through?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "(laughing) I'm not sending a person through there."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To be fair, Grog, I might have tried that, a little.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I sort of stuck my hand in the spinning ball of death and let's just say I'm glad I'm still here standing with you all.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But it seems like anything that goes in that sphere doesn't come out the other end intact.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gilmore-- any of you, Allura-- have you experienced any kind of draw toward the orb? Do you feel different, having been around it for very long?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you think we should be worried?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, it is a very strong relic that we don't know how it works.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The difficulty in our research "is most of our means of inspection are, well,"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In this sense, as it stands.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "May do a bit of traveling ourselves, it seems."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll sketch something with my copious free time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No dragons have buzzed by here in our absence?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The last thing we need "is any of these dragons finding their way up north "where you've kept all of us and the refugees safe, "so we're trying not to piss any of them off, "while also trying to make sure that maybe they're "not really looking behind this curtain of cloud."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't dragons sort of see past those things?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We're doing our best to try and meet those standards."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Our names should be stricken from any record of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But I believe we can go about and speak with them "and help instill the idea that it's for the better good "that you are not mentioned."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Best to be nameless, at this point.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. My choice is The Unmentionables. I like it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Allura says, "I did find some research "on some of these Vestiges you are seeking."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "From what I could bring forth "from the Cobalt Reserve in Westruun, "there is an artifact that lies in the Feywild, "swallowed by a terrible tree."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Wrath of the Fey Warden.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And that it's in the Feywild, but nothing more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The cleansing rivers of the Gilded Run "prevent the spread of the Shademirk Bog that seeps from it."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is held at bay by the rivers of the Gilded Run."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The rivers are called the Gilded Run?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And the Shademirk Bog pours out of the tree?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The tree is responsible for a swampy bog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "From best I could ascertain from my research, yes."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fenthras, Wrath of the Fey Warden.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fenthras is inside of the tree that is terrible.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you know anything about the Vestige itself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Most of the Cobalt Reserve was destroyed "and I was under siege at the moment from the return of the dragons. (sighs)"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you happen to find in your research what, perhaps, we might face in the Feywild? I mean, we've learned a little bit of it, but I know that it's going to be rather dangerous.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've not been there myself, to be honest. It creeps me out."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is a staff that can bend the elements "and was taken into The Abyss "by Joran the Sea-Speaker, hero of the Verdant Expanse, "about four centuries back, and was never heard from again."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I do have some research about the dragons, as well."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The black dragon, you seemingly already dealt with, "if word has come to me correctly."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let's hope they don't decide to strike back soon."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good thing we didn't provoke them in the cave at all, Percival.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If they came there, they would've been provoked, I figured.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They're overall less intelligent than other chromatics." And some of this information you know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, why am I writing this down? I know this shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They generally steer very clear of, or are bent on destroying, "any other types of dragons that may wander in their midst."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I found a bit about this Raishan you mentioned, "and word has spoken, though little that exists out there, "that she is also a very practitioned "weaver of the arcane arts, so be warned."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So much so that she could almost pass as a druid wielding natural magic?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Previous individuals that hoped to raid her space "were swallowed in quaking earth as she laughed from above."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we know where these-- where these dragons have been all this time, where they were banished to?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Raishan used to exist in the mountains outside of Syngorn "and actually had amassed "a sizeable horde of followers, lizard-men. Lizardfolk, all sorts."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wait, then Thordak was banished to the Fire Plane?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So the more time that passes, "the more powerful that network will become."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What else has been banished to the Fire Plane?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I say this because if I were to slowly open the portal to the Fire Plane and power it and make it bigger and bigger and bigger, eventually it would be a hole into that dimension that's big enough for a dragon to fit through, but still not big enough for me, so I need to keep eating, to make it bigger.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just a thought. It may be nothing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You think there's something bigger than Thordak in the Fire Plane?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, I'm sure there is something bigger than Thordak, probably in the Fire Plane, but the Fire Ashari closed the portal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That may not have been the portal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That power may still be flowing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, Allura, how did you lock him in the Fire Plane to begin with?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Once there, all of our forces gathered "and we attacked him, pressed him down, "and the gem that we had convinced him-- "the heart-stone that we had convinced him "to take into himself, "well, we found a way to seal it, "to banish it permanently to that plane so that he could not escape."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could he still potentially have it inside of him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, she asked it, so, technically, it's hers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've been drinking plenty of wine tonight; don't judge me."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Look how clever food makes all of us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, if that is the case, then it's, I think, "there's very much a chance "that he did escape with the heart-stone intact."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If I left the plane with these, are they gonna blow everybody up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It seems that Thordak's very essence "twists the land with elemental magic."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "My distant views of the city "have shown the center of the town cracked with volcanic fire "as he digs and burrows beneath the city itself."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, why is he digging and burrowing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's reshaping the land as he sees fit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or is he looking for something?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is he not looking for something?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He might be looking for something, or might be making--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So these heart-stones embrace the essence of where they reside?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Their essence is created where they reside."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And he has the heart-stone of the Fire Elemental Plane living inside of him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you think he was just making himself at home, or do you think he was looking for something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "From what I could tell from my investigations, "the major step in the Conclave's plan "is already over."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Who knows what the next stage in his terrible design is."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So you're thinking the Chroma Conclave was simply a temporary alliance?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There are very few "permanent alliances between chromatic dragons."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Maybe we can get one of them on our side.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can only be so hopeful that they tear each other apart.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe the white one will want to help kill Thordak with us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Turning them against each other is not a bad idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does the heart-stone make him even stronger than he already was?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know, "but he was not that large when we sealed him."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then we could go inside a dragon again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can go in another dragon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Every one of them, one after the other.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You seen any dragons on the outskirts of the town? Have there been any flyovers or close calls within, say, 50 to 100 miles or so? Any reports?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There were reports of the white dragon a week ago, "south of us. Far south of us."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Unless they know what's underneath the castle, there's nothing of value here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we know where Vorugal has taken up roost? No one knows?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No. I've tried to scry, "but they're apparently protected against that now."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you have a defense planned? A warning system?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's a lot to build and it's a very big space to protect, "but me and Drake are working on some ideas. (sighs)"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you know exactly how these heart-stones are forged?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They were the hearts of the primordial titans "that existed on this world before the gods even came here."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They were the true denizens of this world, before any of us."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is an awesome dinner, by the way. Super good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sorry, it's been a very tense time."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's good to see all of you."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see that she feels guilty that she just did this information dump and is like, "(sighs) It's good to see all of you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was good to see you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We'll talk on the morrow." She gets up. "Kima?" "I'm coming, let me finish."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should have been with us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's a house, really, but a bunch of bricks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Home is where you make it, Kima.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (glug glug) "Next time you're going there, you tell me."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like you in your armor better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's why I missed you." She reaches out and smacks your cheek.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we rest here for a night or two and then, to the Feywild?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We even have a geographic-- demographic location to like--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like the Feywild calls to us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you say we go get you a new bow?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nah. Let's get you a bow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go get you a bow.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to pour another glass of wine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike could go off to get the ocean one herself.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think you've had too much to drink, Scanlan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or the two of you together.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys all going to rest?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have one thing I'd like to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, what do you want to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I want to cast Speak With Plants and have a little chat with the Sun Tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The tree, while still in the winter phase, is definitely teeming with life, to where it once didn't.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I just kind of feel, sense the arcane ley-lines that Allura was talking about that the tree's in the center of?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was just wondering if you knew-- if you could tell me anything about this terrible cancerous tree in the Feywild, if you knew anything about it? He might be like your brother or something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's this tree in the Feywild and it might have a man living in it called Fenthras.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you tell me where there's a really sick tree, maybe in the Feywild?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've been here in Whitestone since day one." (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Put a pair of Birkenstocks on its branches.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You apparently kind of live in the middle of all these arcane ley-lines of the world.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you kind of give me a rough idea? Do they go to the other side of the world? Can you stretch all over the world?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pelor put me here for a reason."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So you're not a natural tree, you're a tree from the gods?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, anyway, you're really awesome, Sun Tree.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, so it was good talking to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to make a once-over on Vax and make sure that-- So you did, you got all the blood off, then?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are you doing? Yeah, I took a bath.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just want to make sure you didn't ruin it by keeping some of the blood in your freaking hair.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't I look all right? I'm fine! What's your problem?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nothing! Just making sure you're doing all right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck, no, not ready, but we can do it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was about to walk out the door, but if you're walking--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Before you leave, I whisper in your ear, "You still have a little blood behind your ear."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you want to take a walk with me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That one needs a little more work.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: While in the cemetery-- I assume that it's still a mess.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was one of the first orders of business that people who live here did, was to return their families to the earth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Was there an Anders family crypt, at one point?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to walk back to the castle, with you in tow, and I'm going to find Zahra.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you going to tell me why you went and saw the Raven Queen?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She has a little candle that's starting to flicker out and she has her feet up on the desk and her tail's kind of curled up and she's falling asleep into the book as you walk in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We all need sleep sometimes, hon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have a task for you, if you have the time and energy for something a bit quiet, but necessary.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Perhaps they will know what to do with that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But I would like her to have a quiet mark in this city.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is this for you, or for my brother?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're apparently all in this together.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I give Percy a kiss on the cheek.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We need all the help we can get.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She takes the vial and puts it on the table.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sighs) I'm going to go to my room--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If Zahra wanted to make some dragon arrows, could she use stuff here in the castle?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll write her a letter and see if they can-- they may have to delve into our materials for it, but I think we're good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll talk about using our materials for such a thing, and I will talk to her about that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to do my little thing and if it works, great, and if not, we'll speak not of it for a while.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and make your tinkering check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Taken a ruby and set it behind it, built it into a clasp that does not reflect, and in it, put a sachet of-- satchel...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not real dragon's blood, but dragon's blood--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've had opium this whole time and you never...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You will find out when I present it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there anyone in the hallway?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was super awesome and I can't wait to see the outcome, but before that happens, I was standing right here when these two walked off, so I am waiting in the exact same spot for my sister to return.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A few hours pass before she returns, but she eventually does.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you still here? You should go to bed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I took a little bit of a nap.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're a grown-ass woman, and you're twice as strong as I am.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Please don't ever do that to me again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just... he's charming, but both eyes open, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know what you are talking about.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to go to my room now and see if I splat on the floor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys are in this big L of all your rooms scattered throughout.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How thick is it? Is it viscous?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Put my hand in it. Does that stay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The hand stays for a minute, then--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also has a fume to it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to scrape a bunch of it up just into my hand, so I have a big handful of it, and I'm just going to go to Grog's room, and I'm going to slowly, just at the door, take time to write, Grog smells like farts and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I walk by him as he's doing this and say, You know he can't read, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Preschoolers run amok in my gentle abode.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Get busy living or get busy dying. Butt-print.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anything else you want to get done?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just told Pike she looked real pretty tonight and I go back to my reading.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear a little (knocking sound) on your door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sorry if I'm waking you up."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We have a lot to talk about."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Puts his arm out to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "(deepening to a growl) It's all I can think about."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I make an insight check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would, if you had time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) I knew it. I knew it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You suffer 18 points of piercing damage, and I need you to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (whispering) We don't know what the hell this is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Has he been a rakshasa the whole time? Wait, is it the rakshasa who's different? Is it not Gilmore? So many questions!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perhaps this will be revealed next week as we kick in at this very moment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why does it always leave off when he's about to get killed?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right! Why is it always you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because he's always almost about to die.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Because he runs into all the rooms first and he makes out with everybody.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because you do. That's the thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He runs into the rooms first and he puts his tongue exciting places.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You also happened to lean in real close--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And whisper in the ear of the rakshasa as he slowly slit its throat across the floor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, that's right, you did do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, so what did you do? What did you do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It just wants to come back and show you the same love.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, wait, did you get the final blow in the rakshasa in the Slayer's Take?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And you said something shitty to him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He threatened my family and I said, "Say something about my sister again," and I slit his throat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What the fuck is going on?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was he? Did you chop him up?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, because I'm not a psycho.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This will be interesting next week when we kick in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a fine line between psycho and practical.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can see chopping someone's body up might be psycho.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not psycho if you drive a very small car with not a lot of trunk space.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there going to be one more giveaway?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There were two Loot Crates, one--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One more DX Loot Crate box coming your way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thanks, Joe Madureira, for the art!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Until then, rest well and, is it Thursday yet? See you then.
